text: my name is Ashish Chen and I'm from
adrenix technologies we are an order
based software development company and
we take care of ERP and the MIS solution
for schools higher education in India
founded in year 2012 with a mission that
we are going to help educational
institution to exploit technology for
the best school administration as well
as to bring the schools and parents
together and make the complete journey
of learning and management a smooth
experience for every stakeholder these
are around 800,000 students number of
parents they are more than a million and
500 schools the last year we were using
some other cloud infrastructure and
there were three things which I shall
didn't call 3s one is scalability second
is security and third is support these
are the three things which any client
they expect from EDX the same thing we
were looking forward towards a cloud
infrastructure provider so we migrated
from our earlier cloud infrastructure to
AWS because the scalability was the big
thing because whenever we were having
some new clients we were having issues
whether we have to get their new
instances and service for the same
second thing was the security because
the kind of data which is very
confidential and by sensitive which is
of student parents and the financial
that of the schools that has they don't
we don't have any choice of compromising
third is that the support till last year
we are having just virtual support
system when a double has come into the
picture we have the support from edibles
partners Prasad's team and they are just
call away and they are very happy to
serve us we migrated more than 300 GB of
data more than 40 TB of data in three
months time from the our existing
platform to AWS and it was so smooth now
we are not worried about the scalability
we can on board more and more clients
without worrying about the
infrastructure and we have not seen the
same kind of for increase in the cost in
last one year we are able to save more
than 40% of our cost on infrastructure
and as well as we have experienced the
performance more than 25 percent our
clients are happy and as business we see
that the cost savings are good
and we are very happy with that
